title: Spiced Phool Makhana 🍿 | Popped Lotus Seeds| Fox Nuts | Healthy snack
content:
Evening snack: Spiced Phool Makhani Servings: 2 Duration: 5 minutes Another name for Lotus seeds called as fox nuts can Puffed up like pop corn 🍿 easy to munch on anytime, they are delicious,crispy and melts nicely. They’re so many varieties of recipes by using Phool Makhana or popped lotus seeds are available at any Indian store, easy to grab a pack and make this yummy 😋 healthy snack at home in 5 minutes. Phool Makhana used to have during the fasting, it can be prepared as kheer, curry or snack. In this recipe, I used pink Himalayan salt if it’s not available to you, you can skip it and use regular salt. Health Benefits of Phool Makhana:
  • Anti-aging
  • 9.7g of protein in 100 gms
  •  Low in calories, fat, and sodium.
  • High potassium and magnesium content makes them very useful for people with high blood pressure
  • High calcium content is good for bone and teeth health
  •  Sugar content is low so useful for diabetics
  •  Useful for kidney ailments
  • People looking for weight loss should try makhana, as they are very low in calories but can fill the stomach.
  • It is rich in fiber and so can be used in weight loss as well as for digestion problems like constipation
Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Phool Makhana / popped lotus seeds - 80 gms
  • Cashew Nuts - 10
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Red paprika - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Curry powder - 1 tsp (Available at Indian Store )
  • Himalayan pink salt - 1/4 tsp
  • Butter - 1/2 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat a skillet pan, add butter and cashew nuts. Fry till they’re light brown color
  • Next goes on salt, pink Himalayan sat, red chilly powder, paprika, turmeric and curry powder
  • Saute 30 secs
  • Then Add popped lotus seeds/ Phool Makhana
  • Stir continuously, make sure the spices coated evenly on each Phool Makhani
  • It takes around 5 mins, just check the crispness before turning off the heat
  • Easy snack is ready to serve
  • Happy cooking and have a good day 😊
